X.iv.1.D.3.b
.
Disability Secondary to a Tobacco-Related SC Disability
Under
38 CFR 3.300(c)
, the establishment of SC for a disability that develops as a result of a tobacco-related disability, for which SC was previously awarded based on the Veteran’s use of tobacco products during service, is prohibited, if such a claim for SC is received on or after June 9, 1998.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D  - Disability  or Death from Use of Alcohol, Drugs, or Tobacco Products
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D
